alert.note: Alert for Chatham; Harnett; Lee; Moore (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 27 at 9:02PM EDT until August 28 at 12:15AM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... South Central Chatham County in central North Carolina... West Central Harnett County in central North Carolina... Lee County in central North Carolina... Northeastern Moore County in central North Carolina... * Until 1215 AM EDT. * At 902 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. The expected rainfall rate is 1 to 1.5 inches in 1 hour. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Sanford, Broadway, Cameron, Gum Springs, Tramway, Lemon Springs, Cumnock, Olivia and Seminole. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE EXPECTED RAINFALL RATE...1-1.5 INCHES IN 1 HOUR
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
